abc.title: One, Two, Three!
abc.headline: Dora and Boots need to cross the river to get to the Apple Tree. Do you see anyone who can help them go across the river?
abc.objective1: Able to say the numbers from one to three in English.
abc.objective2: Able to count objects from one to three in English.
abc.objective3: Able to listen and understand frequently used expressions in English.

abc.title: Yummy Ice Cream
abc.headline: It's an ice cream truck!Do you want to go get some ice cream with Dora and Boots?
abc.objective1: Able to listen and understand "One, please."
abc.objective2: Able to listen and understand frequently used expressions in English.

abc.title: Let's sing a song!
abc.headline: Yay! Welcome to the concert!Let's sing a song with Dora and Boots.
abc.objective1: Able to sing a number song in English.
abc.objective2: Able to follow along a simple dance with friends.

abc.title: Secret Cards
abc.headline: Boots found the secret cards.Can he find all the secret codes and find the hidden pictures?
abc.objective1: Able to learn and recognize the uppercase letters of A, B, C, and D.
abc.objective2: Able to learn the sounds of A, B, C, and D.

abc.title: Go, Go! Little Chicks!
abc.headline: There's a race at Running Forest!Can the timid Little Chicks finish the race?
abc.objective1: Able to learn the expressions, "Run!" and "Jump!"
abc.objective2: Able to listen and understand frequently used expressions in English.

abc.title: Watch Out!
abc.headline: Ahh! Nuts are falling from the trees!Let's say "Watch out!" so Tico can move.
abc.objective1: Able to understand and say, "Watch out!"
abc.objective2: Able to say "Jump!" in appropriate situations.
abc.objective3: Able to listen and understand frequently used expressions in English.

abc.title: Let's sing a song!
abc.headline: Jump! Jump!Let's sing together and jump!
abc.objective1: Able to sing along in English.
abc.objective2: Able to follow along a simple dance with friends.

abc.title: Armadillos' Letter Cards
abc.headline: Our Armadillo friends are hiding.Can our Armadillo friends see the letter cards?
abc.objective1: Able to learn and recognize the uppercase letters of E, F, and G.
abc.objective2: Able to learn the sounds of E, F, and G.

abc.title: The Big Big Beanstalk
abc.headline: There's a rainbow at the top of the Big Big Beanstalk.Can the Unicorn ride the rainbow and get back home?
abc.objective1: Able to learn the words, 'big' and 'small'.'
abc.objective2: Able to compare sizes.
abc.objective3: Able to listen and understand frequently used expressions in English.

abc.title: Big Sheep and Small Sheep
abc.headline: We have to get to the Shepherd Boy at the High Hill!Get past the big cloud and the small cloud! Go! Go! To the High Hill!
abc.objective1: Able to listen and understand the complete sentences, "It's big" and "It's small."
abc.objective2: Able to listen and understand frequently used expressions in English.

abc.title: Let's sing a song!
abc.headline: Today, we sing with a very special friend.Are you ready?
abc.objective1: Able to sing along "Big and Small" song.
abc.objective2: Able to follow along a simple dance with friends.

abc.title: Isa's Alphabet Flowers
abc.headline: Isa has special flower seeds for her friends.Let's plant the seeds and see what flowers grow!
abc.objective1: Able to learn and recognize the uppercase letters of H, I, J, and K.
abc.objective2: Able to learn the sounds of H, I, J, and K.

abc.title: Gingerbread's Magic Cards
abc.headline: Gingerbread is crying!What is happening to Gingerbread?
abc.objective1: Able to learn the names of toys in English.
abc.objective2: Able to listen and understand frequently used expressions in English.

abc.title: Let's make wishes
abc.headline: Let's make a wish on the Little Stars in the toy constellations! What will Dora and Boots wish for?
abc.objective1: Able to understand and say the sentence, "Don't cry!"
abc.objective2: Able to listen and understand the complete sentence, "It's a ______."

abc.title: Let's sing a song!
abc.headline: Our friends are crying because they lost their toys!Sing together to make our friends stop crying.Don't cry!
abc.objective1: Able to sing along "Don't cry" song.
abc.objective2: Able to follow along a simple dance with friends.

abc.title: We can help you, Benny!
abc.headline: Benny is a mailman! Let's help Benny and stamp the letters.
abc.objective1: Able to learn and recognize the uppercase letters of L, M, N, O, and P.
abc.objective2: Able to learn the sounds of L, M, N, O, and P.

abc.title: A Cake for Boots
abc.headline: Today is Boots' birthday! What fruits do we put on his cake?
abc.objective1: Able to learn the names of fruits in English.
abc.objective2: Able to listen and understand frequently used expressions in English.

abc.title: Welcome to Troll Land
abc.headline: Grumpy Old Troll prepared something fo Dora and her friends. Let's go on an adventure to Troll Land.
abc.objective1: Able to listen and understand the complete sentence, "I want_______."
abc.objective2: Able to listen and understand the sentence, "It's yummy!"

abc.title: Let's sing a song!
abc.headline: Boots got a special card from his friends. What will happen when he opens the card?
abc.objective1: Able to sing along in English.
abc.objective2: Able to follow along a simple dance with friends.

abc.title: An Exciting Festival
abc.headline: Wow, There's an exciting festival! Let's enjoy the festival together!
abc.objective1: Able to learn and recognize the uppercase letters of Q, R, S, T, U, and V.
abc.objective2: Able to learn the sounds of Q, R, S, T, U, and V.

abc.title: Clean Up! Clean Up!
abc.headline: Uh oh! This is not the sea we imagined. What is happening in the sea?
abc.objective1: Able to learn the colors of red, yellow, and blue in English.
abc.objective2: Able to listen and understand frequently used expressions in English.

abc.title: Quack! Quack!
abc.headline: Do you hear the sound coming from the book? Quack! Quack! Let's find out what is happening!
abc.objective1: Able to listen and understand the complete sentence, "Color it __________."
abc.objective2: Able to understand and say the sentence, "Color it___________."

abc.title: Let's Sing a Song!
abc.headline: Let's color the picture with pretty colors and sing a fun song.
abc.objective1: Able to sing along in English.
abc.objective2: Able to listen and understand the colors in English while coloring pictures.

abc.title: The Train Wants to Run Again!
abc.headline: Block Train has stopped. The train wants to run again.Let's help the train run again~!
abc.objective1: Able to learn and recognize the uppercase letters of W, X, Y, and Z.
abc.objective2: Able to learn the sounds of W, X, Y, and Z.

abc.title: Go, Go! Big Red Chicken!
abc.headline: We can hear many people cheering for Big Red Chicken.Help Dora and Boots and cheer for Big Red Chicken~
abc.objective1: Able to say the numbers from four to six in English.
abc.objective2: Able to count objects from four to six in English.
abc.objective3: Able to say and count from one to six in English, including the numbers previously learned.

abc.title: What Happened to Swiper?
abc.headline: Something is different about Swiper.What happened to Swiper?
abc.objective1: Able to understand the senctence, "Let's count together."
abc.objective2: Able to listen and understand frequently used expressions in English.

abc.title: Let's Sing a Song!
abc.headline: We invited special friends to the Concert Hall.Let's sing a fun song with our special friends.
abc.objective1: Able to sing along in English.
abc.objective2: Able to follow along a simple dance with friends.

abc.title: Boo Hoo! Boots Is Crying!
abc.headline: Sob... Sobâ€¦ Boots is crying. How can we make him feel better?
abc.objective1: Able to learn and recognize the lowercase letters of a, b, c, and d.
abc.objective2: Able to learn the sounds of a, b, c, and d.

abc.title: Dring Dring Hello?
abc.headline: Ring! Ring! Dora got a phone call!Hello~?
abc.objective1: Able to learn the expressions, "Up!" and "Down!"
abc.objective2: Able to understand the expressions and move accordingly.
abc.objective3: Able to listen and understand frequently used expressions in English.

abc.title: Yay! Guess Who Won
abc.headline: It's the Up and Down Race.Who won the race?
abc.objective1: Able to understand and say the sentence, "Let's go up" and "Let's go down."
abc.objective2: Able to listen and understand frequently used expressions in English.

abc.title: Let's Sing a Song!
abc.headline: Boots is the Dance King!Let's learn to dance from Boots!
abc.objective1: Able to understand and sing along "Up, down" song.
abc.objective2: Able to understand the sentence and move accordingly.

abc.title: Isa Loves Flowers
abc.headline: Isa really likes flowers!Shall we go to Isa's Garden?
abc.objective1: Able to learn and recognize the lowercase letters of e, f, and g.
abc.objective2: Able to learn the sounds of e, f, and g.

abc.title: Let's Go Visit, Benny!
abc.headline: Benny the Chef invited his friends to his barn!Let's go visit him together!
abc.objective1: Able to learn and say the names of yummy food in English.
abc.objective2: Able to experience the characteristic of yummy food.

abc.title: What's Happened at the Festival
abc.headline: What is happening?Our friends are all staring at something!
abc.objective1: Able to listen and understand the complete sentence, "I like_____."
abc.objective2: Able to understand and say the complete sentence, "I like_____."
abc.objective3: Able to listen and understand frequently used expressions in English.

abc.title: Let's Sing a Song!
abc.headline: Let's sing with our cute friends!
abc.objective1: Able to sing along "yummy food" song in English.
abc.objective2: Able to follow along a simple dance with friends.

abc.title: Pajamas Day
abc.headline: Today is Pajamas Day!Let's make our own pajamas!
abc.objective1: Able to learn and recognize the lowercase letters of h, i, j, and k.
abc.objective2: Able to learn the sounds of h, i, j, and k.

abc.title: I'm Lost! Help!
abc.headline: I'm lost!Please help me~! Help! Help!
abc.objective1: Able to learn and say the names of pets in English.
abc.objective2: Able to find a matching house by listening the pet's name in English.
abc.objective3: Able to listen and understand frequently used expressions in English.

abc.title: My New Friend
abc.headline: We have a new friend!Who's the new friend?
abc.objective1: Able to listen and understand the complete sentence, "I have ______."
abc.objective2: Able to understand and say the complete sentence, "I have ______."
abc.objective3: Able to listen and understand frequently used expressions in English.

abc.title: Let's Sing a Song!
abc.headline: Let's sing with our new friends!
abc.objective1: Able to sing along the fun "pets" song in English.
abc.objective2: Able to follow along a simple dance with friends.

abc.title: Warm Hugs
abc.headline: Let's go with Dora and Boots to show our love~
abc.objective1: Able to learn and recognize the lowercase letters of l, m, n, o, and p.
abc.objective2: Able to learn the sounds of l, m, n, o, and p.

abc.title: The Fix-It Machine
abc.headline: Follow me! Like this!
abc.objective1: Able to learn and say the eyes, nose, and the mouth on face in English.
abc.objective2: Able to listen and understand frequently used expressions in English.

abc.title: Halloween Party
abc.headline: What a nice mask!Let's help Dora and Boots make some cool masks.
abc.objective1: Able to listen and understand the complete sentence, "Let's draw ______."
abc.objective2: Able to understand and say the complete sentence, "Let's draw ______."
abc.objective3: Able to listen and understand frequently used expressions in English.

abc.title: Let's Sing a Song!
abc.headline: There are pretty balloons all around us!Let's sing a fun song together!
abc.objective1: Able to sing a long with friends in English
abc.objective2: Able to understand and draw the pictures with complete sentence

abc.title: Uh oh! The Robot Isn't Moving.
abc.headline: Ah! The robot is not moving~Let's help Dora and Boots to find out what happened.
abc.objective1: Able to learn and recognize the lowercase letters of q, r, s, t, u, and v.
abc.objective2: Able to learn the sounds of q, r, s, t, u, and v.

abc.title: Where Should We Go?
abc.headline: Uh oh! Where should Dora and Boots go? Let's help them!
abc.objective1: Able to learn and say the words, "open" and "close".
abc.objective2: Able to listen and understand frequently used expressions in English.

abc.title: Magic Spell!
abc.headline: We came to find amazing treasures, but we got locked in!Let's say the password together!
abc.objective1: Able to listen and understand "Open it" and "Close it".
abc.objective2: Able to understand and say "Open it" and "Close it".
abc.objective3: Able to listen and understand frequently used expressions in English.

abc.title: Let's Sing a Song!
abc.headline: Let's sing a song with fun passwords!
abc.objective1: Able to sing along in English.
abc.objective2: Able to follow along a simple dance with friends.

abc.title: Shoe Store
abc.headline: The shoes at the Shoe Store are all mixed up.Shall we organize the shoes together~?
abc.objective1: Able to learn and recognize the lowercase letters of w, x, y, and z.
abc.objective2: Able to learn the sounds of w, x, y, and z.

abc.title: Don't worry, Tico!
abc.headline: Oh, no! Tico's Nutty Car has stopped.\nHow can we help Tico?
abc.objective1: Able to say the numbers from one to ten in English.
abc.objective2: Able to count objects from one to ten in English.
abc.objective3: Able to listen and understand frequently used expressions in English.

abc.title: I Love Blueberries.
abc.headline: Yummy, juicy blueberries!\nLet's go pick ten blueberries with Dora and Boots!
abc.objective1: Able to listen and understand the sentence, "There are ________."
abc.objective2: Able to count from one to ten in English.
abc.objective3: Able to listen and understand frequently used expressions in English.

abc.title: Let's sing a song!
abc.headline: Fun and easy Number Song!\nLet's sing along with Dora and Boots!
abc.objective1: Able to sing the Number Song in English.
abc.objective2: Able to follow along a simple dance with friends.

abc.title: Find Keys of Treasure Boxes
abc.headline: Dora and Boots have the keys to open the treasure boxes.\nWill you help Dora and Boots find the treasure boxes?
abc.objective1: Able to match the uppercase letters of A, B, C, and D with the corresponding lowercase letters.
abc.objective2: Able to count the numbers from one to four in English.

abc.title: Benny's Puzzles
abc.headline: Dora and Boots are visiting Benny's barn today.\nLet's put the animal puzzles together.
abc.objective1: Able to identify the names of the farm animals.
abc.objective2: Able to listen and understand frequently used expressions in English.

abc.title: Moo
abc.headline: The animal farm around the hill is very noisy!\nDo you want to find out what is happening there?
abc.objective1: Able to listen to the sounds of the farm animals in English.
abc.objective2: Able to listen and understand the sentence, "Cows say 'Moo'."
abc.objective3: Able to listen and understand frequently used expressions in English.

abc.title: Let's sing a song!
abc.headline: Dora and Boots came to a farm.\nLet's sing a fun song with animal friends!
abc.objective1: Able to sing along in English.
abc.objective2: Able to follow along a simple dance with friends.
